Description: The technical specifications to refer when using the package. Easy-going, offline supported (via web PWA installation), and detailed oriented. Courtesy from ZORALab's Hestia.

Designs.Description: This component was designed by the following creators:
Designs.Title: Designers

Designs.Description:
This component has the following dependencies (arranged in the order from
left-top to right-bottom):
Designs.Title: Dependencies

Designs.Description:
For HTML, ZORALab's Hestia employs the W3C native syntax for simplicity and
maximum compatibility sakes. ZORALab's Hestia recommends the following HTML code
structure for this component.
Designs.Title: HTML

Designs.Code: ...
Designs.Description: The minimum required HTML codes are shown below:
Designs.Title: Minimum HTML

Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-display
CSS PROPERTY : display
DEFAULT      : block (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the display mode of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Display

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-box-sizing
CSS PROPERTY : box-sizing
DEFAULT      : border-box (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the box-sizing behavior of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Box-Sizing

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 2rem auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 2rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-overflow
CSS PROPERTY : overflow
DEFAULT      : auto auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the overflow behavior of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Overflow

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : .3rem solid var(--pre-color) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-border-radius
CSS PROPERTY : border-radius
DEFAULT      : .5rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border radius of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border Radius

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-min-width
CSS PROPERTY : min-width
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the minimum width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Min-Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-width
CSS PROPERTY : width
DEFAULT      : 100% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-max-width
CSS PROPERTY : max-width
DEFAULT      : 100% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the maximum width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Max-Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-min-height
CSS PROPERTY : min-height
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the minimum height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Min-Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-height
CSS PROPERTY : height
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-max-height
CSS PROPERTY : max-height
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the maximum height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Max-Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-font-size
CSS PROPERTY : font-size
DEFAULT      : var(--body-font-size) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the font size of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Font Size

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-font-family
CSS PROPERTY : font-family
DEFAULT      : monospace (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the font family of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Font Family

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-text-decoration
CSS PROPERTY : text-decoration
DEFAULT      : normal (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the text decoration of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Text Decoration

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-word-break
CSS PROPERTY : word-break
DEFAULT      : keep-all (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the word breaking behavior of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Word Break

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-letter-spacing
CSS PROPERTY : letter-spacing
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the letter spacing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Letter Spacing

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-line-height
CSS PROPERTY : line-height
DEFAULT      : var(--body-line-height) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the line height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Line Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-text-align
CSS PROPERTY : text-align
DEFAULT      : justify (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the text alignment of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Text Align

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-white-space
CSS PROPERTY : white-space
DEFAULT      : pre (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the white-spacing behavior of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: White-space

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-300) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-color-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-300) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component while in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Inverted Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-color-print
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-300) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component when in print mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-background
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--color-contrast-50) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Background

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-background-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--color-contrast-50) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component while in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Background (Inverted Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-background-print
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--body-background-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component when in print mode.
Designs.Title: Background (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --pre-transition
CSS PROPERTY : transition
DEFAULT      : var(--timing-rapid) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the animation timing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Transition

Designs.Description: Fortunately, this component does not use any JavaScript. Relax.
Designs.Title: JavaScript

Functions.Description: Render the CSS output for this UI component.
Functions.Title: ToCSS

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package's primary purpose is to provide user interface (UI) styling
specifically for preformatted values.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Main Purpose

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package was known as 'pre_hestiaUI' before ZORALab's Hestia 'v1.2.0'. The
transformation was due to someone attempting to steal the design copyrights and
makes way for programming package's documentation restructuring.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Legacy Recording

Title: zoralabPRE Technical Specification - ZORALab's Hestia
